00079         private void GetNetworkInfo(string Name, string UserName, string Password)
00080         {
00081             try
00082             {
00083                 NetworkAddresses = new List<NetworkAddress>();
00084                 IPHostEntry HostEntry = Dns.GetHostEntry(Name);
00085                 foreach (IPAddress Address in HostEntry.AddressList)
00086                 {
00087                     NetworkAddress TempAddress = new NetworkAddress();
00088                     TempAddress.Type = Address.AddressFamily.ToString();
00089                     TempAddress.Address = Address.ToString();
00090                     NetworkAddresses.Add(TempAddress);
00091                 }
00092             }
00093             catch { throw; }
00094         }

00096         private void GetNetworkAdapterInfo(string Name, string UserName, string Password)
00097         {
00098             try
00099             {
00100                 ManagementScope Scope = null;
00101                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00102                 {
00103                     ConnectionOptions Options = new ConnectionOptions();
00104                     Options.Username = UserName;
00105                     Options.Password = Password;
00106                     Scope = new ManagementScope("\\\\" + Name + "\\root\\cimv2", Options);
00107                 }
00108                 else
00109                 {
00110                     Scope = new ManagementScope("\\\\" + Name + "\\root\\cimv2");
00111                 }
00112                 Scope.Connect();
00113                 ObjectQuery Query = new ObjectQuery("SELECT * FROM Win32_NetworkAdapterConfiguration WHERE IPEnabled=True");
00114                 using (ManagementObjectSearcher Searcher = new ManagementObjectSearcher(Scope, Query))
00115                 {
00116                     using (ManagementObjectCollection Collection = Searcher.Get())
00117                     {
00118                         foreach (ManagementObject TempNetworkAdapter in Collection)
00119                         {
00120                             MACAddress = TempNetworkAdapter.Properties["MacAddress"].Value.ToString();
00121                         }
00122                     }
00123                 }
00124             }
00125             catch { throw; }
00126         }
